title: Accordion
description: Organizes content into collapsible sections with smooth animations.

title: Active-Scroll-Page
description: Displays the active page and updates as users scroll or click on navbar links.

title: Age-Calculator
description: Calculates a person's age based on their date of birth.

title: Calculator
description: Performs basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

title: Calender
description: Display current date.

title: Character-Word-Counter
description: Counts and displays the number of characters and words in a given text input.

title: Circular-Progress-Bar
description: Displays progress visually in a circular format.

title: Code-Editor
description: Provides a platform for writing and editing code like CodePen.

title: Counter-Animation
description: Animates a counter that starts from 1 and increments up to specific number.

title: Country-Data
description: Retrieves and displays information about countries based on user search input.

title: Degree-Converter
description: Converts temperatures between Celsius and Fahrenheit.

title: Digital-Clock
description: Displays the current time in a digital format, updating every second.

title: Drag-Drop
description: Records and monitors personal expenses to help manage and track spending.

title: Expense-Tracker
description: Have some issues. Functional will be Coming Soon.

title: Form-Validation
description: Validates user input in forms and submits the data to a Google Sheet upon form submission.

title: Generate-Password
description: Generates random and secure passwords with options to copy and paste the generated password for easy use.

title: Guess-Number
description: Allows users to guess a randomly generated number and provides feedback on whether their guess is too high, too low, or correct.

title: Guess-Word
description: Allows users to guess the name of a randomly selected technology or tech-related term, providing feedback on each guess.

title: Image-Gallery
description: A main box with a background, heading, paragraph, button, and three image boxes. Navigation buttons update the boxes and content of the main box.

title: Image-Gallery-Website
description: Hovering on a bar reveals a list, list hover changes the image, and hovering on the image or cross makes the image full screen.

title: Image-Slider
description: Displays a series of images that users can navigate through by sliding left or right.

title: Japanese-Handicraft-Items
description: Showcases a collection of Japanese handicraft items with an image slider and language options for English and Japanese.

title: Jokes
description: Generates and displays random jokes upon request.

title: Keep-Notes
description: Allows users to create, edit, and manage notes for personal organization.

title: Light-Bulb
description: Light bulb with options to switch on and off light bulb.

title: Memory-Game
description: A game where users match pairs of hidden cards by remembering their positions.

title: Menu-Text-Hover
description: Colored menu text comes up on hover.

title: Modern-Menu
description: Display image when hover or click on menu items.

title: Music-Player
description: A complete music player with play, pause, skip track, adjust volume, display playtime, total time, shuffle, repeat modes, upload, delete music, and a clickable music list.

title: Order-Button
description: Displays an animated button that confirms an order has been placed when clicked.

title: Pagination
description: Displays pagination numbers and updates the current page number dynamically.

title: Parallax-Scroll
description: Implements a parallax scrolling effect where background images move slower than foreground content.

title: Password-Strength
description: Evaluates and displays the strength of a password based on specified criteria.

title: Placeholder-Image
description: Generates placeholder images with specific dimensions, background color, text color, and custom text, and includes a feature to copy the image link.

title: Product-Listing-Page
description: Have some issues in product listing. Functional will be Coming Soon.

title: Product-Page
description: Allows users to change product size, color, quantity, dynamically updates the price, adds selected quantity to the cart icon, and changes product images at intervals.

title: QR-Code
description: Creates QR codes from user input text or URLs.

title: Quiz
description: Presents a series of questions for users to answer and provides feedback on their responses and score after attending every question.

title: Rock-Paper-Seizor
description: Allows users to play the classic game of Rock-Paper-Scissors against the computer.

title: Scroll-Animation
description: Applies different animations to various headings, paragraphs and images as they scroll into view.

title: Scroll-Reveal
description: Displays hidden boxes with randomly generated background colors when the user scrolls.

title: Search-Image
description: Allows users to search for and display images based on input keywords.

title: Show-Image
description: Displays a specific part of an image on hover.

title: Stopwatch
description: Provides functionality to start, stop, reset, and save lap times during timing sessions.

title: Text-to-Voice
description: Converts text input into spoken audio output using speech synthesis technology.

title: Thermometer
description: Changes the thermometer icon to indicate increasing temperatures.

title: To-Do
description: Enables users to create, manage, and track tasks in a to-do list format.

title: Toast-Notification
description: Displays brief, auto-dismissible messages for success, invalid input, and error notifications.

title: Upload-Image
description: Allows users to select and upload images from their device to set profile image.

title: Weather
description: Retrieves and displays current weather conditions and forecasts for a searched city.

title: XML-HTTP-Request
description: Retrieves and displays country data via an XML HTTP request.
